DN42 Peering

  • ASN: DN4242422116
  • IPv4: 172.23.10.32/27
  • IPv6: fd0b:1aae:3130::/48

Peering Policy

  1. I prefer multiprotocol BGP sessions over link local IPv6.
  2. Extended Next Hop is currently not supported.
  3. WireGuard only.
  4. NO SLA Guarantee.
  5. We are open to peering! Feel free to contact us.

Start peering
